CustomField.description: A unique, business formatted code to identify a Project being managed under an Opportunity Outcome.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Where record type = Research Partnership Project THEN format should be: RPP-00001 Where record type = IPU Project THEN format should be: INP-00001 Where record type = Research Commercialisation Project THEN format should be: RCP-00001 Where record type = StartUp THEN format should be: RCC-00001
CustomField.label: Code
